description: The palace of Boa Hancock, Empress of Amazon Lily, located at the center of the island. It features luxurious accommodations including private bathhouses and serves as both the seat of government and Hancock's personal residence.

keyEvents.title: Hancock Refuses Government Summons
keyEvents.description: Elder Nyon confronts Hancock in the palace about answering the World Government summons, but Hancock throws her out of the palace window.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the palace as the seat of power on Amazon Lily and the site of major political decisions.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Crashes Into the Bathhouse
keyEvents.description: Luffy accidentally falls through the palace roof and lands in Hancock's private bathhouse, seeing her most closely guarded secret.
keyEvents.significance: The palace bathhouse becomes the site of the pivotal first meeting between Luffy and Hancock.

keyEvents.title: The Slave Mark is Revealed
keyEvents.description: Within the bathhouse, Luffy sees the Hoof of the Soaring Dragon marked on Hancock's back.
keyEvents.significance: The palace's privacy is violated, leading to the revelation that will define Hancock's arc.

geography.terrain: Palace structure on Amazon Lily island

politicalStatus: Seat of government for Amazon Lily
keyFeatures: Multiple levels with windows (from which Nyon is thrown)

description: An island in the Calm Belt inhabited exclusively by the Kuja tribe, a nation of powerful female warriors. Men are forbidden from the island under penalty of death. It is protected by its location in the Calm Belt and by Boa Hancock's status as a Warlord of the Sea.

keyEvents.title: Hancock's Triumphant Return
keyEvents.description: The Yuda arrives at Amazon Lily with Boa Hancock and her sisters, greeted by celebrating Kuja warriors.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the reverence the Kuja people have for their empress.

keyEvents.title: Villagers Discuss the Gorgon Legend
keyEvents.description: Kuja villagers explain the fabricated legend about the Gorgon Sisters defeating a monster and receiving a curse.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals how the isolated Kuja society has been deceived about the sisters' true past.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Desperate Search
keyEvents.description: Luffy runs through Amazon Lily searching for someone who will lend him a ship to reunite with his crew.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Luffy's growing desperation on an island where no one will help him leave.

politicalStatus: Independent nation under protection of the World Government due to Hancock's Warlord status
keyFeatures: Men are forbidden and face execution if discovered
